title: Payment Gateway Integration
desc: This project is to simulate a secure transaction through a payment gateway, like Razorpay. The transaction simulated here is a dummy one and no details are stored anywhere. But, please stick to dummy data. Once you click on initiate transaction, a prompt will appear from Razorpay and you can proceed.

title: Activity Scheduler
desc: This project is to showcase a small activity scheduler, which uses takes in user input and schedule the task. Users can edit or remove the tasks. It also has a weather summary, which consumes open weather map API. Styling is done using Tailwind CSS, Material UI and Semantic UI. A Dockerfile is added that helps quick deployment.

title: Metamask Integration
desc: This project is to simulate a secure wallet based transaction, signed through the Metamask wallet. Before you begin, make sure that Metamask is installed in your browser. Once you click on initiate transaction, a prompt will appear in the Metamask extension to sign the transaction through your secure wallet.
